Text: Then it's true...

Yes. I can only conclude that the Church itself is up
to no good.
They are inside Mitsugoshi's spa resort.

It is a gorgeous hot spring within a baroque-style
building.

The slain archbishop and the man who murdered him—
they both served the Cult of Diablos...

I'm afraid I don't know any more than that though.
All the proof has been covered up, and I can't find
any other means of re-entering the Sanctuary.

A facility of that scale could never be kept hidden
without some significant covering up.

And the only organization with that much power and
influence is...
Alexia draws closer to Iris.

I don't care if it's high-handed. We must investigate
the Church! If we go on the pretense of following up
on leads related to incidents here in the capital, no
way can they turn a blind eye...
Not even they can refuse...!
I said as much to our father...His Majesty.
He insisted that I leave the matter be.
But...!
It's quite like His Majesty to avoid rocking the boat.

I surmise he wants to avoid causing any undue turmoil
with the Church in order avoid upsetting our allies in
Oriana and receiving a visit from their king.
"Undue"...

In order force his hand, we will need to either
present clear evidence,

or demonstrate that we have the strength to overcome
any sort of national crisis.

In that sense, I suppose it's most fortunate for us
that the Bushin Festival is to be held this year.
The Bushin Festival...!

The prestige of successive wins at the festival would
be the perfect way to draw further backing from the
knight orders.

And if we bring home the honor of victory at an
international tournament to the kingdom, it will
also solidify support among the citizenry.

Once we're in such a position, neither His Majesty nor
those in the palace will be able to ignore what we have
have to say.

But Iris, what if the Shadow Garden or the Cult try
to hatch some sort of plot?

They've already been maneuvering behind the scenes of
every big event so far. I suspect the Bushin Festival will
be no different...
Alexia...
Do not worry yourself.
No matter what powerful artifacts they possess...
my sword will never fail.
No! Artifacts aren't the only power they have...!

You saw the magical radiance that lit the capital,
didn't you?

No human could ever produce such force. The only
reasonable source is an artifact with immense magic
reservoirs, such as we saw at the academy.
But Shadow, his power is—
Iris cuts Alexia off mid-sentence.
And...I saw it.
The artifact that they let run amok.
Oh yes, I saw it...
Iris clenches her hands unbidden.
Iris...

At any rate, we cannot turn our backs on this. If
they dare show their faces at the Bushin Festival,
we will put an end to them. Simple as that.
Both the Cult and the Shadow Garden.

But more importantly, why did you pursue them in the
Sacred Land?
Um...

I gave you permission to investigate the archbishop
and nothing more.

When did I say that you were to follow dangerous
groups into dangerous locations?

I-It wasn't like I went after them because I wanted
to...

It was more like evacuating in the face of an
emergency...or maybe willful negligence...
Oh dear, I think the heat is making me dizzy!
I'll just head over to the cold bath!
Alexia hurriedly exits the sauna.

Iris watches her go with a rueful smile that abruptly
turns forlorn.

My order lost its core strength almost immediately
after forming with nary a prospect of recovery
sight.

Even the orders that have backed me thus far are
beginning to have their doubts...

I suppose they would, seeing as how I squandered the
superior recruits I drew to my side after so much
arm-twisting.
Victory is my only course.

I will put on a show of strength and carve a path
forward, as I always have. It is the only way...

Just as Iris makes her vow, she hears a satisfying
clap from outside the sauna.
Huh?
*clap*

Rose practices alone, swinging her sword beneath the
pouring rain.

The stroke flashes through the air with no wasted
movement.
However, Rose is not satisfied.
She swings her blade again and again.
The swordplay she saw back then...
That beautiful swordsmanship...
Just as she readies her sword again...
Agh...!
...pain shoots through Rose's chest.
Unh...!
She instinctively clutches her chest.
Wha...

Spreading from her cleavage, the faint traces of
possession can be seen...
